feed.title: Open Information Science
feed.subtitle: A RSS feed containing the latest articles published in Open Information Science

entry.title: Proposing a Conceptual Framework for Social Listening in Libraries: A Potential Game Changer to Engage Gen Z and Centennial Users

entry.title: Roles, Challenges, and Sustainability of Australian Journals: A Survey of Editors
entry.summary: Article by Hamid R. Jamali, Simon Wakeling DOI: https://doi.org/10.1515/opis-2025-0013

entry.title: The Now-Defunct ResearchGate Score and the Extant Research Interest Score: A Continued Debate on Metrics of a Highly Popular Academic Social Networking Site
entry.summary: Article by Jaime A. Teixeira da Silva DOI: https://doi.org/10.1515/opis-2024-0011

entry.title: When Data Meets the Past: Data Collection, Sharing, and Reuse in Ancient World Studies
entry.summary: Article by Andrea Farina, Paola Marongiu, Mathilde Bru, Daniele Borkowski DOI: https://doi.org/10.1515/opis-2025-0014
